search.title: Hello world, once again
search.text: hello world once again <p> < href="https://pluralisticnet/2023/01/21/potemkinai/#heyguys">enshittification web</> forces revive blog</p><p>‚Äôve been getting more uncomfortable giving data big corporations owning that post much because don‚Äôt ¬† bothers ¬†still</p><p> like idea personal blogs figured this something should try again ‚Äôve following some nice microblogs href="https://chriscoyiernet">chris coyier</> href="http://aegirorg/">aegir</> href="https://micropopagandhicom">adrianna tan</> href="https://melanierichardscom">melanie richards</> others href="https://matthiasottcom/notes">matthias ott</>‚Äôs new project href="https://buttondownemail/ownyourweb">own your pushed towards restarting site</p><p>‚Äôm really sure how going work let‚Äôs see where takes¬†</p>

search.title: I also ‚ù§Ô∏è Typography
search.text: also ‚ù§Ô∏è typography <p>today some fonts were launched < href="https://fontsilovetypographycom/fonts/harbortype"> love typography</> used spend hours reading ilt back when college ( probably still ) most complete blog topic mean just take look href="https://ilovetypographycom/contents/"> archive</></p><p> last few years seen consolidation loads intellectual property very hands could almost say font market starting like mono poly</p><p>from perspective brings breath fresh air into this by being more humane alternative other big distributors that they have curation products sell promote plus their proprietary href="https://fontsilovetypographycom/cedars">cedars+ search</> tried powerful!</p><p>‚Äôd thank href="https://fontsilovetypographycom/about/meetteam">nadine chahine</> welcoming well ilt ‚Äôm happy part !</p>

search.title: Month in review: October 2023
search.text: month review: october 2023 <p>inspired by melanie richards‚Äô < href="https://melanierichardscom/blog/tags/learninglog">learning logs</> ‚Äôm starting this series document things that happened each month reason calling ‚Äúlearning logs‚Äù feel very productive selfimprovement area most time ‚Äúmonth review‚Äù seems lighter ‚Äôll try best remember what did keep going promises though</p><p>october started with wife making down payment our new apartment are still waiting bank finish their part paperwork all goes well should have home around end november</p><figure class="width480 floatright" style="maxwidth: min(480px var(contentwidth)););"><picture><source type="image/webp" srcset="/img/y3a1vu0om0480webp 480w /img/y3a1vu0om0960webp 960w /img/y3a1vu0om02048webp 2048w" sizes="100vw"><source type="image/jpeg" srcset="/img/y3a1vu0om0480jpeg /img/y3a1vu0om0960jpeg /img/y3a1vu0om02048jpeg sizes="100vw"><img src="/img/y3a1vu0om0480jpeg" width="480" height="319" alt="five people stading wooden deck foliage background" loading="lazy" decoding="async"></picture><figcaption> fabio haag type team from left right: eduilson coan sofia mohr ana laydner haag</figcaption></figure><p>around middle there href="https://fabiohaagtypecom/en">fabio type</> team meetup formal make sound remote nice see one another face once while had lunches beers worked little bit well fun :)</p><p> smaller news ‚Äôs been while ps4 wouldn‚Äôt boot finally took repair shop evaluation only used play rocket league (which become kinda toxic) when guests didn‚Äôt interested getting fixed instead proposed exchange bricked pair joy‚Äëcons they accepted ¬†small win!</p><p> towards restarted blog that‚Äôs something worth celebrating</p><h2 id="reading" tabindex="1">reading class="headeranchor" href="#reading">#</></h2><p>‚Äôve trying ditch youtube before bedtime read book instead problem depending reading get sleepy quickly takes ages anything lunch myself during week figured take kindle use time effective</p><p>this finished reading truman capote‚Äôs classic href="https://wwwpenguinrandomhousecom/books/23728/coldbloodbytrumancapote/"> cold blood</> retelling holcomb murders detailed sure least half he narrates really happen read regardless</p><p> also more recent memoir href="https://wwwsimonandschusterca/books/howmurderyourlife/catmarnell/9781476752419">how murder your life</> cat marnell autobiography highfunctioning drug addict working fashion publishing industry rollercoaster author herself recognizes there‚Äôs about downfall rich privileged makes hard us look away surprisingly page¬†turner</p><h2 id="watching" tabindex="1">watching href="#watching">#</></h2><p>‚Äôve watched first season href="https://wwwimdbcom/title/tt14362262">el encargado</> ( charge) ¬†have seasons href="https://wwwyoutubecom/@taskmaster">taskmaster</>!</p><p> href="https://wwwimdbcom/title/tt14452776"> bear</> favorite episode far href="https://wwwimdbcom/title/tt18233708">episode 7 ‚Äúreview‚Äù</> watch show does immediatly main characters fall love other let‚Äôs hope keeps like second season</p><h2 id="listening" tabindex="1">listening href="#listening">#</></h2><p> songs ‚Äôve added deezer tracks:</p><ul><li>< href="https://wwwyoutubecom/watchv=nlwp9gt2kfq">popstar researching oblivion</> flotation toy warning</li><li>< href="https://wwwyoutubecom/watchv=xgk86v8puam">happiness</> hobo johnson</li><li>< href="https://wwwyoutubecom/watchv=ltezm5ayslw">hayloft ii</> mother mother</li><li>< href="https://wwwyoutubecom/watchv=nrwuodpo2fo">left hand free</> altj</li><li>< href="https://wwwyoutubecom/watchv=l3k1uleavgw">bitch</> allie x</li><li>< href="https://wwwyoutubecom/watchv=scmmzhlsqcq">elephant woman</> blonde redhead</li><li>< href="https://wwwyoutubecom/watchv=w_vr5u5qxzy">dna</> anna f</li></ul><p> grew tired many podcasts usually listen giving them break other hand binge listening href="https://wwwpatreoncom/ifbookspod"> books could kill</> loving similar vibe href="https://underunderstoodcom/podcast/newstarthere">underunderstood</> which like enjoying latest episodes href="https://pjvogtsubstackcom/p/welcomesearchengine">search engine</> theme song incredibly catchy)</p><p>writing out looks eventful than usual november will bring!</p>

search.title: Kerning in PowerPoint
search.text: kerning powerpoint <p>microsoft word expects data gpos table old style kern this how make work both apps</p><p> glyphs first prepare font using <em>kern flattener</em> script by < href="https://githubcom/mekkablue/glyphsscripts">mekkablue</> will open copy current document turn all group into glyph set some other parameters export new document somewhere ttf close file there‚Äôs need save needed anymore</p><p> then extract <code>kern</code> table exported fonts xml <strong>< href="https://githubcom/fonttools/fonttools">ttx</></strong> following terminal command that couple files:</p><pre class="languageplain" tabindex="0"><code class="languageplain">ttx t o somefontregularkernxml somefontregularttfttx somefontboldkernxml somefontboldttf</code></pre><p> don‚Äôt like having bunch duplicate ttfs laying around trip immediately delete fonts</p><p>back original glyphs file usual then time merge extracted above with final fonts command:</p><pre m somefontregularttf somefontregularkernxmlttx somefontboldttf somefontboldkernxml</code></pre><p>alternatively possible via python creating empty ttfont object importing copying over something this:</p><pre class="languageplain">from fonttoolsttlib import ttfontttf_file = "somefontregularttf"kern_file "somefontregularkernxml"ttf_font ttfont(ttf_file)kern_font ttfont()kern_fontimportxml(kern_file)ttf_font["kern"] kern_font["kern"]ttf_fontsave(ttf_file)</code></pre><figure class="screenshot" style="maxwidth: min(960px var(contentwidth)););"><picture><source type="image/webp" srcset="/img/akkq9pf8ug960webp 960w /img/akkq9pf8ug1920webp 1920w" sizes="100vw"><source type="image/jpeg" srcset="/img/akkq9pf8ug960jpeg /img/akkq9pf8ug1920jpeg type="image/png" srcset="/img/akkq9pf8ug960png /img/akkq9pf8ug1920png sizes="100vw"><img src="/img/akkq9pf8ug960jpeg" width="960" height="700" alt="screenshot mac window slide being editted contains text box ‚Äútype‚Äù which demonstrates working because ‚Äúy‚Äù slightly tucked under right side ‚Äút‚Äù horizontal stroke" loading="lazy" decoding="async"></picture></figure><p> have tested stylistic sets (unencoded glyphs) values surprisingly those works does affect powerpoint :</p><ul><li>version 2309 365</li><li>version 1678 mac</li></ul>

search.title: Type Cooker: auxiliary
search.text: type cooker: auxiliary <figure class="" style="maxwidth: min(960px var(contentwidth)););"><picture><source type="image/webp" srcset="/img/ykqglaynb960webp 960w /img/ykqglaynb1920webp 1920w" sizes="100vw"><source type="image/jpeg" srcset="/img/ykqglaynb960jpeg /img/ykqglaynb1920jpeg type="image/png" srcset="/img/ykqglaynb960png /img/ykqglaynb1920png sizes="100vw"><img src="/img/ykqglaynb960jpeg" width="960" height="360" alt=" word ‚Äúauxiliary‚Äù set over beige background" loading="lazy" decoding="async"></picture></figure><p>first exercise using < href="http://typecookercom/">typecooker</> flex creativity this took longer than ‚Äôd like admit ‚Äôm still really happy with way strokes join crotch areas hey need let them go</p><p><strong>typecooker parameters:</strong></p><ul><li>construction: <em>roman</em></li><li>stroke endings: <em>straight serif</em></li><li>contrast amount: <em>visible</em></li><li>contrast type: <em>translation</em></li><li>width: <em>narrow</em></li><li>weight: <em>light</em></li></ul>

search.title: Bebop
search.text: bebop <figure class="" style="maxwidth: min(900px var(contentwidth)););"><picture><source type="image/webp" srcset="/img/qbm6vm3kem900webp 900w /img/qbm6vm3kem1800webp 1800w" sizes="100vw"><source type="image/jpeg" srcset="/img/qbm6vm3kem900jpeg /img/qbm6vm3kem1800jpeg type="image/png" srcset="/img/qbm6vm3kem900png /img/qbm6vm3kem1800png sizes="100vw"><img src="/img/qbm6vm3kem900jpeg" width="900" height="480" alt="four mockups iphone showing different screens app" loading="lazy" decoding="async"></picture></figure><p>what amazing piece software < href="https://wwwjackchengcom/bebop/">bebop</> opens instantly with keyboard ready go type your thoughts into tap save note saves folder have configured starts new blank just¬†perfect!</p><p> came across yesterday href="https://wwwthevergecom/24158659/aiassistantchatgptgpt4ogooglesearchdysonwashg1installer">installer</> newsletter ‚Äôm looking forward integrating workflow</p><p>also lovely shade yellow</p>

search.title: My default apps for 2024
search.text: default apps 2024 <p> first saw this kind post < href="https://chriscoyiernet/2023/11/25/defaultapps2023/">chris coyier‚Äôs blog</> last year recently popping other blogs (< href="https://notesjeddacpcom/defaultapps2024/">jcprobably</> href="https://kevquirkcom/blog/defaultappsend2024">kev quirk</> come mind) decided give try</p><p>üì® <strong>mail service:</strong> fastmail gmail (work) <br>üìÆ client:</strong> via safari web app apple mail <br>üìÅ <strong>file manager:</strong> href="https://binarynightscom">forklift 4</> <br>üìù <strong>notes:</strong> href="http://obsidianmd">obsidian</> href="https://ianet/writer">ia writer</> href="https://wwwraycastcom">raycast</> notes <br>‚úÖ <strong>:</strong> href="https://culturedcodecom/things/">things 3</> <br>üìÜ <strong>calendar:</strong> calendar <br>üôçüèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è <strong>contacts:</strong> contacts <br>üóûÔ∏è <strong>rss:</strong> href="https://netnewswirecom">netnewswire</> <br>‚å®Ô∏è <strong>launcher:</strong> switched from href="https://wwwobdev/products/launchbar">launchbar</> everything except files folders which now use href="https://wwwstclairsoftcom/defaultfolderx/">default folder x</> <br>‚òÅÔ∏è <strong>cloud storage:</strong> dropbox &amp; icloud <br>üõü <strong>backups:</strong> href="https://wwwarqbackupcom">arq</> <br>üåÖ <strong>photo library:</strong> <br>üé® editing:</strong> photos lightroom ios href="https://appsapplecom/app/processingaestheticphotos/id6505000108">processing</> <br>üì∏ <strong>screenshots:</strong> href="https://cleanshotcom">cleanshot href="http://gohustlco">hustl</> timelapses <br>üåé <strong>browser:</strong> <br>üí¨ <strong>chat:</strong> whatsapp <br>üîñ <strong>bookmarks:</strong> <br>üìë <strong>read later:</strong> open tabs safari unfortunately <br>üìö <strong>reading:</strong> kindle paperwhite (7th gen) mobile devices <br>üìú <strong>word processing:</strong> pages <br>üìà <strong>spreadsheets:</strong> numbers <br>üìä <strong>presentations:</strong> adobe indesign <br>üõí <strong>shopping lists:</strong> href="https://appsapplecom/app/grocerysmartshoppinglist/id1195676848">grocery</> <br>üí∞ <strong>personal finance:</strong> href="http://ynabcom">ynab</> <br>üéµ <strong>music:</strong> deezer music <br>üéôÔ∏è <strong>podcasts:</strong> href="https://pocketcastscom">pocket casts</> <br>üîé <strong>search:</strong> kagi duckduckgo <br>üßÆ <strong>code editor:</strong> href="https://wwwsublimetextcom">sublime text</> href="https://zeddev">zed</> most things <br>üìî <strong>git href="https://forkdev">fork</> <br>‚è±Ô∏è <strong>timesheets:</strong> href="https://timneatsoftware">tim</></p><p> some related practice</p><p>üñåÔ∏è <strong>designing fonts:</strong> href="http://glyphsappcom">glyphs</> <br>üìè <strong>kerning:</strong> href="http://kerncom">kern </> <br>üî¨ <strong>inspecting:</strong> href="https://wwwfontmasternl/otmasterhtml">dtl otmaster 89</> <br>üíØ <strong>testing:</strong> href="https://githubcom/fonttools/fontbakery">font bakery</> href="https://fontgogglesorg/">fontgoggles</> microsoft office windows ¬†mac cc textedit etc</p>
